src:
Pevec zapustil ženo in šel z oboževalko
Frontman skupine Iron Maiden živi s 15 let mlajšo. Bruce Dickinson je pred tremi leti premagal raka.
05 Nov 2019, 13:02 by T. P.



guliver/cover imagesIron Maiden so še vedno dejavni. FOTO: guliver/cover images



guliver/cover imagesPo 30 letih je ljubezni konec. FOTO: guliver/cover images



guliver/GETTY IMAGESNjegovo premoženje cenijo na 100 milijonov evrov. FOTO: guliver/Getty Images



facebookLeana je delala tudi kot novinarka in intervjujala glasbene skupine. FOTO: facebook



instagramZ Leano menda živita v Parizu. FOTO: instagram


Zdravstveni alarm, ko ne veš, ali se boš izvlekel ali ne, lahko človeku pošteno premeša seznam prioritet in spremeni pogled na življenje. »Živimo zdaj. Prav to minuto, prav to sekundo. Zdaj!« je pred dobrimi tremi leti razglašal Bruce Dickinson, pevec glasbene zasedbe Iron Maiden, ko mu je po mesecih kemoterapije in obsevanja uspelo premagati raka na grlu v tretjem stadiju. Ko je trepetal za življenje, mu je ves čas ob strani stala in ga negovala žena Paddy Bowden, a ko je bil Bruce spet zdrav, se je


Po 30 letih je ljubezni konec. FOTO: guliver/cover imagesguliver/cover images

njuna 30-letna zveza izpela. Dolgoletna zakonca sta se lani po tihem razšla, Bruce pa je novo srečo in vnovičen življenjski elan dobil v objemu 15 let mlajše učiteljice joge Leane Dolci.Pol svojega življenja je 61-letni rocker preživel s Paddy, ki mu je povila sinova Austina in Griffina ter hčerko Kio, jesen svojega življenja pa je legendarni heavymetalec sklenil preživeti z oboževalko. »Leana že 10 let spremlja Iron Maiden, v zadnjem letu pa se je zelo zbližala z Bruceom in tudi že spoznala njegove otroke,« je izdal vir in dodal, da je Paddy zdaj nekje v Južni Ameriki, saj se je želela od vsega nekoliko odmakniti in si vzeti čas zase.
50 milijonov bo Paddy bogatejša po ločitvi.
Temelji življenja so se Bruceu pošteno zamajali za božič leta 2015, ko so mu zdravniki med rutinskim pregledom na jeziku odkrili dve rakavi tvorbi. Bolezen je bila v tretjem stadiju, toda kljub zloveščim napovedim se rocker ni vdal in pol leta pozneje je slavil zmago nad rakom, svojo izkušnjo je bralcem posredoval tudi v avtobiografiji. Iskreno in brez ovinkarjenja je pisal o svoji bolezni, zaradi katere je začel še bolj ceniti življenje, le poglavja o svoji družini ni delil s svetom. »Po tem ni nikakršne potrebe. Marsikdo verjame, da pranje umazanega perila v javnosti prodaja knjige in viša naklado, a jaz ne želim biti del tega,« je dejal pevec, ki se že od nekdaj na vse pretege trudi svojo zasebnost in družinsko življenje skrivati pred medijsko radovednostjo. Morda tudi zaradi


Z Leano menda živita v Parizu. FOTO: instagraminstagram

tega vest o njegovem razhodu s Paddy tako dolgo ni prišla na plan. Vseeno se mu je zdaj vsaj toliko razvezal jezik, da je priznal, da živi s svojim novim dekletom, menda v Parizu.Dickinson je očitno že obrnil nov list v svojem življenju, vseeno pa ne on ne Paddy še nista zagnala ločitvenega kolesja. Če bosta vendar vložita ločitvene papirje, pa se bo morda razbesnela borba za premoženje, v kateri bi zvezdnik lahko izgubil polovico svojega premoženja, ki je ocenjeno na približno 100 milijonov evrov. 


Leana je delala tudi kot novinarka in intervjujala glasbene skupine. FOTO: facebookfacebook
text:
The singer left his wife and went with a fan
Iron Maiden Group frontman lives 15 years younger. Bruce Dickinson beat cancer three years ago.
05 Nov 2019, 12:02 by T.P.



gulliver / cover imagesIron Maiden are still active. PHOTO: gulliver / cover images



gulliver / cover images After 30 years, the love is over. PHOTO: gulliver / cover images



gulliver / GETTY IMAGESTheir property is valued at € 100 million. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images



facebookLeana also worked as a journalist and interviewed music groups. PHOTO: facebook



instagramZ Leano is supposed to live in Paris. PHOTO: instagram


A health alarm, when you do not know whether to pull out or not, can honestly mix the list of priorities and change the outlook on life. “We live now. Right this minute, right this second. Now! ”Declared Bruce Dickinson, singer of the Iron Maiden band three years ago, when he managed to overcome stage three throat cancer after months of chemo and radiation. As he trembled for life, he was constantly sidelined by his wife, Paddy Bowden, but when Bruce was healthy again,


After 30 years, the love is over. PHOTO: gulliver / cover imagesguliver / cover images

their 30-year relationship has come to fruition. Longtime spouses broke up after a quiet year last year, and Bruce received a new fortune and a renewed life span in the embrace of 15-year-old yoga teacher Leana Dolci. daughter Kio, and in the fall of his life the legendary heavyweight player decided to spend time with a fan. "Leana has been following Iron Maiden for 10 years, and in the last year she has become very close to Bruce and has already met his children," a source added, adding that Paddy is now somewhere in South America, wanting to move away from it all and take time for yourself.
50 million will make Paddy richer after his divorce.
The foundations of life were honestly missed for Bruce in Christmas 2015, when doctors discovered two cancers during a routine language exam. The disease was in the third stage, but despite the ominous predictions, the rocker did not give in and, half a year later, celebrated his victory over cancer, he shared his experience with readers in an autobiography. He wrote honestly and without hesitation about his illness, which made him appreciate life even more, but he did not share the chapter about his family with the world. “There is no need for that. Many believe that washing dirty laundry in public sells books and increases circulation, but I do not want to be a part of it, "said the singer, who has always struggled to hide his privacy and family life from media curiosity. Maybe because of


Leana and I seem to live in Paris. PHOTO: instagraminstagram

this news of his split with Paddy had not come to plan for so long. Still, at least he had his tongue unbuttoned enough to admit he was living with his new girlfriend, apparently in Paris.Dickinson had apparently already turned a new leaf in his life, but neither he nor Paddy had yet started a separation wheel. However, if they do file for divorce papers, however, it may become enraging for a property battle in which the celebrity could lose half his assets, estimated at around € 100 million.


Leana also worked as a journalist and interviewed music groups. PHOTO: facebookfacebook
